id,

update banner
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update banner set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sn = #{sn,jdbcType=INTEGER}, deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from banner where deleted = 0 order by sn
